Title: Chapter Nine: The Magic Castle
Writer: Michael Connelly (based on the novels by), Eric Ellis Overmyer (developed for television by), Diane Frolov (teleplay by), Andrew Schneider (teleplay by)
Actors: Titus Welliver, Jamie Hector, Amy Aquino, Lance Reddick
Plot: The true story of the bones murder is finally revealed, placing Bosch in hot water and stretching the LAPD to the breaking point. Bosch's own painful past leads him headlong into a showdown with Raynard Waits.
